rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with ample natural light and a welcoming ambiance. The design ensures good feng shui and Vastu compliance, as the north direction is auspicious.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area designed for relaxation and social gatherings, oriented in an east-west alignment to benefit from sunlight.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with proper lighting, ensuring a quiet environment. The room is arranged near the north side of the apartment to promote productivity while keeping it away from distractions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen layout optimized for energy flow and ease of movement, ensuring that the stove faces east for positivity as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A serene reading space with natural lighting. The library is located in a quiet corner on the ground floor to encourage calm and concentration, following principles of sound energy and light flow.

openings.description: A robust door ensuring security and proper ventilation. The north-facing entrance is designed per Vastu recommendations for prosperity.
Multiple windows placed strategically to maximize natural light, while maintaining energy flow throughout the home.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with a private balcony and ample storage space. The room orientation is optimized for restful sleep and good airflow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom offering comfort and functionality, arranged to ensure privacy and adequate light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-planned bathroom with natural lighting and ventilation. The placement ensures privacy and energy efficiency.

openings.description: Balcony door providing access to the rooftop terrace, ensuring an open view and fresh air.
Windows that promote cross ventilation and ensure balanced energy distribution on the first floor.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An expansive terrace offering a peaceful escape with views, designed to be used as a relaxation space and for occasional gatherings. The terrace includes seating areas, greenery, and water features.

openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop from the first floor living area, ensuring ease of movement.
